html:
School Result

Student ID: {{ doc.student }}

Percentage: {{ doc.percentage }}%

{% if doc.student %} {% set student_doc = frappe.get_doc("Student Collection", doc.student) %}

Student Details

Name: {{ student_doc.student_name }}

Grade: {{ student_doc.grade }}

{% else %}

No student linked to this result.

{% endif %}
